title.narrative: 1.4 EDU- IMPROVE LEARNING OUTCOMES

description.narrative: EDU: By 2017 increase pre-primary enrollment and completion of grade 9 in underperforming districts to reduce inequalities and improve learning outcomes, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Early Learning, Education In Emergencies, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Skills Development, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2017 improved quality social services are available and utilized, so disparities and inequalities are reduced in Health, HIV AIDS, Nutrition, Water Sanitation, Education & Child protection
